Text:
For clarification, this is a /new/ EVO build, not the same as the previous one that was leaked in 2012.

Also, Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash remain unplayable, sadly.

No Flutters? Pity, I understand the absence of Rainbow but FS looked pretty much completed in the last demo videos. 
Nevertheless, I'm very much grateful for this leak.

...Please, next time, message me via YT or whatever before uploading this. Also, this is the same build as the EVO2K one, except for some personal modifications that I made, like extra stages, Story Mode (CPU) and Team VS.
Thank YOU! I hope Hasbro can be convinced to take back the C&D, but if not... Well, at least we still have this to remember the project by... :'(

The game works great, though I can apparently only use my analog stick on a 360 controller. I can't remap to the gamepad. (might try JoyToKey though) I found movelists online which is practically a necessity.

I'm quite sad that this has been hit with a C&D, but I hope that they can work something out with Hasbro. There are also a few petitions online. The finished game would have been amazing.

Note: I DID get a virus detection in the EXE by Avast, labeling it as a suspicious file. This seems to be a false positive.
Great game! But where are more instructions??

I found a good move list here: http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120916190720/mlpfanart/images/3/35/Full_move_list_Fighting_is_Magic.jpg

Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy are unplayable at this point in the game, so their moves are not included.

I think this not from mane6 but it's a mod by ohter :

- lot of bugs (in select screen, the gravitation in sugarcube corner...)
- old typo for number of hits (not same as in the fluttershy trailer)
- no FT, no RD
- it's not the moment for the team to leak a such bad version

SO, thank you to NOT lying about this, it's not good for mane6 and for fans. It's not a problem to put this on the Bay, but please, if this not from Mane6 as I think, DO NOT say it is.
thx! awesome. stupid hasbro. i hope to play as rainbow dash & fluttershy soon!
I'm crying because Hasbro fcked up FiM >_
This is so good! Haven't had this much fun with a fighting game since Super Smash Bros. I hope Ha$bro works something out with Mane6 to make this game happen. :(
No fluttershy...? Well I'm still hoping to see where this project goes. Hopefully they don't all get scared off by Hasbro's S&D
